answers.author: Derek Johnson
answers.text:
Taunya, 
I referred your question to Thomas Wieczorek, the senior manager of ICMA's public safety program. He informed me that yes, ICMA DOES handle these types of requests. He recommended you contact him if you would like to further follow up on this issue:
Thomas Wieczorek
Senior Manager, Public Safety Programs, ICMA
202-962-3542
twieczorek@icma.org
Hope this helps!
Derek Johnson

author: Unknown
text:
I work for The Woodlands Township in Texas. I am searching for a list of consultants that may be qualified to perform a Law Enforcement Study and a list of consultants that may be qualified to facilitate and research a governance planning project, to whom we can send an RFP to. Would ICMA be a potential source and if so, is this anywhere on your website?
Thank you for your time and quick response in this matter.
Taunya Jacques, CPS
Executive Assistant to the President
The Woodlands Township
10001 Woodloch Forest Drive, Suite 600
The Woodlands, Texas  77380
281-210-3481 phone
281-210-3499 fax
tjacques@thewoodlandstownship-tx.gov
title: Question regarding Qualified Consultants
